channel.title: Web Accessibility on DillonBaird.io

item.title: Web Accessibility: More than A Lighthouse Score
item.description:
Web accessibility… kinda like fitness, right? Everybody knows it matters, but too many folks think they’re golden just because they’ve got a fancy fitness tracker and hit their 10,000 steps a few times a week. Newsflash: that’s not gonna cut it, and neither will a perfect Lighthouse score or a shiny new overlay tool.

I’ve been around the web dev block a few times, and it seems like everyone’s obsessed with these quick fixes…
